text: Having an issue with Forms when they are used as embeds in HS pages, how do I go about coloring in the thank you message in line. I cant do it via css as the form loads via IFRAME so I can't target it like I would like to

I guess I can do it by overriding with the `inlineMessage` property and then hardcdoing the css in a style attribute, just seems like a crazy workaround since this should be done via CSS... unless I am missing something obvious
interesting, looks like when you use the `css:''` attribute, it stops the form from loading as an `IFRAME` otherwise, you get an `IFRAME` good to know
